20101224024219.000|20101224024222.000|CC1|  dual-ingredient Zegerid OTC.  
20101224024222.000|20101224024223.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20101224024223.000|20101224024224.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20101224024224.000|20101224024226.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20101224024226.000|20101224024226.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20101224024226.000|20101224024229.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20101224024229.000|20101224024229.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20101224024229.000|20101224024232.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20101224024232.000|20101224024234.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20101224024234.000|20101224024235.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20101224024235.000|20101224024235.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20101224024235.000|20101224024238.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20101224024238.000|20101224024238.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20101224024238.000|20101224024240.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20101224024240.000|20101224024240.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20101224024240.000|20101224024242.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20101224024242.000|20101224024244.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20101224024244.000|20101224024244.000|CC1|            by helping          
20101224024244.000|20101224024245.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20101224024245.000|20101224024245.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20101224024245.000|20101224024248.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20101224024248.000|20101224024248.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20101224024248.000|20101224024251.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20101224024251.000|20101224024251.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20101224024251.000|20101224024253.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20101224024253.000|20101224024253.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20101224024253.000|20101224024255.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20101224024255.000|20101224024255.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20101224024255.000|20101224024257.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20101224024257.000|20101224024258.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20101224024258.000|20101224024258.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20101224024258.000|20101224024301.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20101224024301.000|20101224024301.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20101224024301.000|20101224024302.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20101224024302.000|20101224024304.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20101224024304.000|20101224024304.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20101224024304.000|20101224024306.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20101224024306.000|20101224024306.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20101224024306.000|20101224024308.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20101224024308.000|20101224024308.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20101224024308.000|20101224024310.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101224024310.000|20101224024312.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20101224024312.000|20101224024312.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20101224024312.000|20101224024314.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20101224024314.000|20101224024314.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20101224024314.000|20101224024316.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20101224024316.000|20101224024316.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20101224024316.000|20101224024319.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20101224024319.000|20101224024319.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20101224024319.000|20101224024320.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20101224024320.000|20101224024320.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20101224024320.000|20101224024323.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20101224024323.000|20101224024323.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101224024323.000|20101224024326.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20101224024326.000|20101224024327.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20101224024327.000|20101224024329.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20101224024329.000|20101224024329.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20101224024329.000|20101224024331.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,  
20101224024331.000|20101224024331.000|CC1|   reported sometimes less than 
20101224024331.000|20101224024334.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20101224024334.000|20101224024334.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious     
20101224024334.000|20101224024340.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.    
20101224024340.000|20101224024607.000|SEG_01|Type=Story start
20101224024340.000|20101224024607.000|SEG|Type=Story
